title: *CROWN HEIGHTS * 2BR 1.5BA MASSIVE DPLX WITH PRIVATE YARD *NO FEE*SEP1
posting_body: ['Located on Prospect Pl & Rogers ave In Crown Heights', 'This apt HAS BROKER FEE OF This wont last !!!', 'On Franklin Ave min’ to the C S Short walk to the 2 3 4 5,', 'Variety of all the best Bars, Restaurants, Coffee Shops and so much more on and off the block.', 'Washer and Dryer hook up.', 'Gorgeous New Gut renovated Duplex in an updated Brownstone,', 'Unit has 2 rooms on the ground floor and finished basement with the back yard access,', 'Island kitchen with Top of the Line S/S Appliances.', 'Cozy living room space.', 'Queen size bedroom on the front of the unit,', 'Small bedroom facing the back,', 'Large Finished basement!,', '1.5 baths.', 'New Marble finishes.', 'Large finished Private Back Yard.', 'Shared Roof', 'Few Steps from the 2/3/4/5/S/A/C trains.', 'Near  bars, shops and restaurants as well as the Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, Prospect Park, Franklin Ave and much much more!!', 'Good Credit /Guarantors welcome /Pets', 'Case by case']
